full_text:
REVERSE GEARS.

	It shall be unlawful for any person to operate on the waters of the entrance channel any power or motor-driven vessel that does not have a reverse gear or the means to reverse and stop the vessel, except when participating as a contestant in a race, regatta, demonstration, exhibition, or other special event which has been authorized by the Director.

6.catch_line: Permits For Races And Special Events.

14.catch_line: Anchoring Or Mooring In Entrance Channel.

16.catch_line: Fees Incidental To Recovery, Movement And Storage.

17.catch_line: Dangerous Vessels, Sunken Vessels, Or Obstruction Of Channels.

22.catch_line: Prohibited Operation Upon Waters Of The Channel.

23.catch_line: Prohibited Activities Upon Areas Abutting The Entrance Channel.

plain_text:
LOS ANGELES MUNICIPAL CODE

REVERSE GEARS. (§ 69.07)

  REVERSE GEARS.	It shall be unlawful for any person to operate on the waters
of the entrance channel any power or motor-driven vessel that does not have a
reverse gear or the means to reverse and stop the vessel, except when
participating as a contestant in a race, regatta, demonstration, exhibition, or
other special event which has been authorized by the Director.
